New Records: Sam Curran took 3/12 and was awarded the Player of the Match award
Key Match Events: England won by 5 wickets (with 6 balls remaining)
Shan Masood had a concussion test as he was hit on helmet by Chris Jordan's delivery
BA Stokes: 50 off 47 balls (5 x 4, 1 x 6)
Jos Buttler was caught by Mohammad Rizwan off Haris Rauf for 26 runs
Moeen Ali was bowled by Mohammad Wasim for 19 runs
Phil Salt was caught by Iftikhar Ahmed off Haris Rauf for 10 runs
Alex Hales was bowled by Shaheen Shah Afridi for 1 run
Pre-Game Insights: Toss: England, elected to field first
Post-Match Reflections: Sam Curran was awarded the Player of the Match award
Sam Curran was also awarded the Player of the Series award
England won the 2022/23 ICC Men's T20 World Cup
